Phase 2: Email execution with auto-send and approval workflow

Implemented automatic email sending with approval workflows:

Features:
- Gmail Sender Service for sending drafts and emails via Gmail API
- Email Handler executes sending tasks from task executor
- Email Respond Route enhanced with auto-send logic
- Email Sending Endpoint for direct email sending

- Inquiry/spam emails: Auto-send after 1 hour delay
- Order/support/complaint emails: Require approval from Kenny

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Core infrastructure for autonomous task execution

Implemented the foundation for agent task execution system:

Core Services:
- Task Executor: Polls squad_tasks every 2 min, dispatches to handlers
- Approval Workflow: Safety rules for auto-execute vs require-approval
- Alert Service: Notifies Kenny of critical events via email/dashboard
- Execution Handlers: Stubs for email, social, marketing, SEO, ads agents

API Endpoints:
- /api/cron/tasks/execute - Task executor cron job \(every 2 min\)
- /api/tasks/[id]/approve - Approve tasks requiring permission
- /api/tasks/[id]/reject - Reject tasks with reason

Database:
- Migration 007: execution_attempts, requires_approval, approved_by fields
- New tables: alerts, dashboard_notifications, agent_configs, execution_snapshots

Safety Features:
- Retry logic: 3 attempts with exponential backoff, then escalate
- Rate limiting per operation \(50 emails/day, 20 posts/day, etc.\)
- Dry-run mode support \(AGENT_DRY_RUN=true\)
- Rollback snapshots for failed executions

Auto-Execute Rules:
- FAQ emails \(after 1 hour delay\)
- Minor SEO fixes \(<10 products\)
- Bid decreases in ads

Require Approval:
- Customer emails \(orders, support, complaints\)
- Social media posts
- Newsletters
- Bulk changes \(>10 products\)

Documentation:
- PHASE_1_COMPLETE.md - Phase 1 handover summary
- FULL_AUTONOMY_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md - Complete 7-phase roadmap

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
